results.title: Protective effect of amlodipine on diazinon-induced changes on oxidative/antioxidant balance in rat hippocampus
results.text_hl: Pronobesh et al. showed that pretreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@AM@@@ reduced the extent of @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial damage@@@ and reversed the activities of TCA cycle and respiratory marker enzymes towards normalcy.

citations.NLM: Nili-Ahmadabadi A, Ali-Heidar F, Ranjbar A, Mousavi L, Ahmadimoghaddam D, Larki-Harchegani A, Ghafouri-Khosrowshahi A. Protective effect of amlodipine on diazinon-induced changes on oxidative/antioxidant balance in rat hippocampus Res Pharm Sci. 2018 Aug;13(4):368-376. PMID: 30065770
citations.BibTeX: @article{30065770, title={Protective effect of amlodipine on diazinon-induced changes on oxidative/antioxidant balance in rat hippocampus}, author={Nili-Ahmadabadi A and Ali-Heidar F and Ranjbar A and Mousavi L and Ahmadimoghaddam D and Larki-Harchegani A and Ghafouri-Khosrowshahi A}, journal={Res Pharm Sci}, volume={13}, number={4}, pages={368-376}}

results.title: Loading Amlodipine on Diamond Nanoparticles: A Novel Drug Delivery System
results.text_hl: Thus, nanodiamond could provide a drug delivery system to shuttle several drugs through the blood-brain barrier (BBB) which represents a real challenge for the effective delivery of several drugs into the brain. @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ is a calcium channel blocker that cannot pass through BBB and may elicit neuroprotective effects to reverse @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@-induced excitotoxicity and @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial dysfunction@@@ that underlie several @DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurologic disorders@@@ including @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@ and @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@.

citations.NLM: Alawdi SH, Eidi H, Safar MM, Abdel-Wahhab MA. Loading Amlodipine on Diamond Nanoparticles: A Novel Drug Delivery System Nanotechnol Sci Appl. 2019;12():47-53. PMID: 32099339
citations.BibTeX: @article{32099339, title={Loading Amlodipine on Diamond Nanoparticles: A Novel Drug Delivery System}, author={Alawdi SH and Eidi H and Safar MM and Abdel-Wahhab MA}, journal={Nanotechnol Sci Appl}, volume={12}, pages={47-53}}

results.title: Protective effects of amlodipine on mitochondrial injury in ischemic reperfused rat heart.
results.text_hl: Protective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial injury@@@ in @DISEASE_Myocardial_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015428 @@@ischemic reperfused@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ heart.

citations.NLM: Khan NA, Chattopadhyay P, Abid M, Pawdey A, Kishore K, Wahi AK. Protective effects of amlodipine on mitochondrial injury in ischemic reperfused rat heart. J Environ Biol. 2012 May;33(3):591-5. PMID: 23029908
citations.BibTeX: @article{23029908, title={Protective effects of amlodipine on mitochondrial injury in ischemic reperfused rat heart.}, author={Khan NA and Chattopadhyay P and Abid M and Pawdey A and Kishore K and Wahi AK}, journal={J Environ Biol}, volume={33}, number={3}, pages={591-5}}

results.title: Protective role of the calcium channel blocker amlodipine against mitochondrial injury in ischemia and reperfusion injury of rat liver.
results.text_hl: Protective role of the calcium channel blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ against @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial injury@@@ in @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@ischemia and reperfusion injury@@@ of rat liver.

citations.NLM: Pronobesh C, Dagagi AV, Pallab C, Kumar WA. Protective role of the calcium channel blocker amlodipine against mitochondrial injury in ischemia and reperfusion injury of rat liver. Acta Pharm. 2008 Dec;58(4):421-8. PMID: 19103576
citations.BibTeX: @article{19103576, title={Protective role of the calcium channel blocker amlodipine against mitochondrial injury in ischemia and reperfusion injury of rat liver.}, author={Pronobesh C and Dagagi AV and Pallab C and Kumar WA}, journal={Acta Pharm}, volume={58}, number={4}, pages={421-8}}

results.title: [Endothelioprotective properties of L-arginine in a nitric oxide deficiency model].
results.text_hl: In laboratory animals with @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@nitric oxide deficiency@@@) modeled by the introduction of NO-synthase inhibitor @CHEMICAL_NG_Nitroarginine_Methyl_Ester @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019331 @@@L-NAME@@@, the activation of endothelioprotective effects of @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@lozartan@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@ is revealed for their introduction in combination with @CHEMICAL_Arginine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001120 @@@L-arginine@@@.

citations.NLM: Pokrovskiĭ MV, Pokrovskaia TG, Kochkarov VI, Artiushkova EB. [Endothelioprotective properties of L-arginine in a nitric oxide deficiency model]. Eksp Klin Farmakol. 2008 Mar-Apr;71(2):29-31. PMID: 18488903
citations.BibTeX: @article{18488903, title={[Endothelioprotective properties of L-arginine in a nitric oxide deficiency model].}, author={Pokrovskiĭ MV and Pokrovskaia TG and Kochkarov VI and Artiushkova EB}, journal={Eksp Klin Farmakol}, volume={71}, number={2}, pages={29-31}}

results.title: Protection of regional mechanics and mitochondrial oxidative phosphorylation by amlodipine in transiently ischemic myocardium.
results.text_hl: Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ pretreatment prevented @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial dysfunction@@@ during @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ and accelerated recovery of both myocardial mechanical function and blood flow when compared with placebo.

citations.NLM: Dunlap ED, Matlib MA, Millard RW. Protection of regional mechanics and mitochondrial oxidative phosphorylation by amlodipine in transiently ischemic myocardium. Am J Cardiol. 1989 Nov 7;64(17):84I-91I; discussion 91I-93I. PMID: 2530890
citations.BibTeX: @article{2530890, title={Protection of regional mechanics and mitochondrial oxidative phosphorylation by amlodipine in transiently ischemic myocardium.}, author={Dunlap ED and Matlib MA and Millard RW}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={64}, number={17}, pages={84I-91I; discussion 91I-93I}}

results.title: Effects of amlodipine and perindoprilate on the structure and function of mitochondria in ventricular cardiomyocytes during ischemia-reperfusion in the pig.
results.text_hl: No drug treatment changed haemodynamic and electrophysiological parameters, but @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and perindoprilate, either alone or combined, prevented @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial alterations@@@ but only partially.

citations.NLM: Mamou Z, Chahine M, Rhondali O, Dehina L, Chevalier P, Descotes J, Bui-Xuan B, Romestaing C, Timour Q. Effects of amlodipine and perindoprilate on the structure and function of mitochondria in ventricular cardiomyocytes during ischemia-reperfusion in the pig. Fundam Clin Pharmacol. 2015 Feb;29(1):21-30. PMID: 24588464
citations.BibTeX: @article{24588464, title={Effects of amlodipine and perindoprilate on the structure and function of mitochondria in ventricular cardiomyocytes during ischemia-reperfusion in the pig.}, author={Mamou Z and Chahine M and Rhondali O and Dehina L and Chevalier P and Descotes J and Bui-Xuan B and Romestaing C and Timour Q}, journal={Fundam Clin Pharmacol}, volume={29}, number={1}, pages={21-30}}

results.title: Characterization of zinc-induced neuronal death in primary cultures of rat cerebellar granule cells.
results.text_hl: The @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ channel blockers @CHEMICAL_Nimodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009553 @@@nimodipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ reduced both @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial injury@@@ and cell death; the blockade of ionotropic glutamate receptors with @CHEMICAL_Dizocilpine_Maleate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016291 @@@MK-801@@@ or @CHEMICAL_6_Cyano_7_nitroquinoxaline_2_3_dione @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018750 @@@CNQX@@@ was ineffective.

citations.NLM: Manev H, Kharlamov E, Uz T, Mason RP, Cagnoli CM. Characterization of zinc-induced neuronal death in primary cultures of rat cerebellar granule cells. Exp Neurol. 1997 Jul;146(1):171-8. PMID: 9225750
citations.BibTeX: @article{9225750, title={Characterization of zinc-induced neuronal death in primary cultures of rat cerebellar granule cells.}, author={Manev H and Kharlamov E and Uz T and Mason RP and Cagnoli CM}, journal={Exp Neurol}, volume={146}, number={1}, pages={171-8}}
